job_title: Human Resources Director in Jackson, MS
pros: I did make some good work friends there.
cons: Very cut throat environment.  It's very difficult to trust the leaders especially the executive leadership.  The CEO (Mark) is terrible.  They had $1 million in severance packages being paid out, which tells you that the HR team is terrible. Most of the physicians there are employed by the health system and most are unhappy.  The turn-over rate for the medical staff was almost 35% which is unheard of and very costly.  Unethical - they have a compliance officer who is nice, but she is all for show.  Unprofessional work environment.  So, much to say bad about this place.  Please, think twice about going to work there.

review_title: MANY great people work there every day and give 110% but never are recognized recognized for their efforts!!
pros: Treat the older employees with respect!!
cons: Better billing !!! Speed up the time patients are seen in the ER!!!

pros: Patients are great.  I really can't provide you with any other positives.  There are some good employees stuck because there are little opportunity if you live here.
cons: All the good leaders leave.  We are stuck with a lot of bad leaders that remain from the bottom to top.  Growth mission is a vision failure but executive leadership listens to no one and drives us into financial ruin.  Leaders are exited if they don't go along.

pros: Adena is constantly striving to move foward, comparing itself with other local hospitals and offering it's employees multiple ways to advance as individuals.
cons: It's location; located in a small city amongst even small cities. Also the patient to staff ratio could be better, but this is a common theme with hospitals nationwide.

pros: Great hospital, serves 6 counties of south ohio area. Good reputation for quality of healtbcare as a community hospital. Good relarionship with pharmacy and nursing.
cons: Pretty rural area. Not a best place to live. An hour south from Columbus. Not easy commute from Columbus. Other than location, everything is good.

review_title: Great place to start your career!

cons: No retention at all! If you are a current employee, you get to watch all new providers get all the perks while you get none
